historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-38, see notes following § 26-1101.

Miscellaneous Notes

Section 3 of D.C. Law 18-38 provides:

"Sec. 3. Applicability.

"Except for section 2(c)(1), (g), (j), and (o), this act shall not apply until the Commissioner of the Department of Insurance, Securities, and Banking has promulgated rules implementing this act."

DC CODE § 26-1120.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Commissioner shall regularly report violations of this chapter, as well as enforcement actions and other relevant information, to the NMLSR. The reports shall be subject to the provisions of § 26-1120.01.
Each licensee shall submit to the NMLSR reports of condition, which shall be in such form and shall contain such information as the NMLSR may require.

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry reporting requirements.
